conclusion: Analyze forces and use static equilibrium principles.
Identify forces: gravitational force mg, tension T, normal force N.
Resolve tension T into components: T cos θ (vertical) and T sin θ (horizontal).
Apply vertical equilibrium: T cos θ = mg.
Apply horizontal equilibrium: T sin θ = N.
Solve for tension T: T = mg / cos θ.
Determine normal force N: N = mg tan θ.
Find force F exerted by the rope: F = mg / cos θ.
